%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2

import molsysmt as msm

Model loop

molecular_system = msm.convert('pdb_id:1az5', to_form='molsysmt.MolSys')

The structure in the PDB has biological assemblies. There are geometrical transformations proposed in the structure. See the following issue in the source code repository: https://github.com/uibcdf/MolSysMT/issues/33

/home/diego/projects-uibcdf/MolSysMT/molsysmt/item/mmtf_MMTFDecoder/to_molsysmt_Topology.py:34: UserWarning: The structure in the PDB has biological assemblies. There are geometrical transformations proposed in the structure. See the following issue in the source code repository: https://github.com/uibcdf/MolSysMT/issues/33
  warnings.warn(warning_message)
/home/diego/projects-uibcdf/MolSysMT/molsysmt/item/mmtf_MMTFDecoder/to_molsysmt_Topology.py:44: UserWarning: The structure in the PDB has biological assemblies. There are geometrical transformations proposed in the structure. See the following issue in the source code repository: https://github.com/uibcdf/MolSysMT/issues/33
  warnings.warn(warning_message)
